mapper.select: SELECT BNO , TITLE , WRITER -- 상관 서브 쿼리 (corelative subquery) , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FILES F WHERE B.BNO = F.BNO ) FILESCOUNT , TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) REGDATE , HIT FROM BOARD B WHERE MENU_ID = #{ menu_id } ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT BNO , MENU_ID , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REGDATE FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{ bno }
SELECT FILE_NUM ,BNO ,FILENAME ,FILEEXT ,SFILENAME FROM FILES WHERE BNO = #{ bno }
SELECT FILE_NUM , BNO , FILENAME , FILEEXT , SFILENAME FROM FILES WHERE FILE_NUM = #{ arg0 }
